title: Sugar Beach Condo Resort, St Croix, US Virgin...
text:
Updated Articles and Resources © Sugar Beach Condo Resort 
Sugar Beach Condo Resort is a peaceful oasis filled with personalized touches set on seven acres and a 500-foot stretch of premier beachfront on St. Croix in the U.S. Virgin Islands. The resort is just 1.5 miles from the quaint Dutch town of Christiansted, making the hotel an excellent base for exploring St. Croix. 
Sugar Beach Condo Resort Rooms and Accommodations 
All 42 condo units offer a full view of the aqua waters of the Caribbean, and ground-floor units open right onto the palm-lined, white sand beach. The vacation suites range from intimate studios of 654 square feet to four-bedroom units with 3,129 square feet. In between are one, two and three bedroom suites, ranging in size from 768 to 1,762 square feet. All suites have fully equipped kitchens with refrigerators, microwaves, and dishwashers as well as ceiling fans, cable TV, DVD player, stereos, and washer/dryers in most units. 
Sugar Beach Condo Resort Activities and Amenities 
The hotel is well situated for viewing tropical sunrises from your private veranda and watching the waves break on the nearby coral reef. Guests enjoy swimming and snorkeling from the private beach and in the free-form freshwater pool. The pool is adjacent to a historic 1700's Danish sugar mill, sunning deck, and guest clubhouse. The resort also has lighted tennis courts. 
St Croix is an adventure lover’s paradise offering endless opportunities for land and water activity and exploration including diving and snorkeling, kayaking, nature hiking, and horseback riding. Two award-winning golf courses are located nearby. 
Sugar Beach Condo Resort Dining and Restaurants 
Sugar Beach does not have an on-site restaurant. Breezez Bar and Restaurant is located next door and serves lunch, dinner and Sunday brunch. You can reach it by going towards the ocean and turning right. They serve good continental food and specialize in fresh Caribbean lobster. Sugar Beach is located just 5 minutes from downtown Christiansted, which offers hundreds of excellent dining choices. Each of the rooms at Sugar Beach also comes equipped with a full kitchen and large dining areas allowing for home-cooked meals, as well. 
Sugar Beach Condo Resort Information 
Address: 3245 Estate Golden Rock, Christiansted, St. Croix, USVI 00820 Telephone: 1-800-524-2049 (US and Canada); 340-718-5345. International Direct: 340-718-5345
